```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library("prob")
library("bayesrules")
sc <- NULL
while(is.null(sc)) {
  alpha <- sample(2:5, 1)
  beta <- sample(6:10, 1)
  threshold <- round(runif(1, 0.3, 0.7), 2)
  p <- pbeta(threshold, alpha, beta, lower.tail = FALSE)
  sol <- p
  sc <- num_to_schoice(sol, range = c(0, 0.99), delta = 0.03)
}
```
